title: WSJ News Exclusive | Covid-19 Vaccine Mandates Turn Into Religious Tests at GE, Disney—Some Longer Than Others
author: Chip Cutter; Thomas Gryta
description: Do you take Tylenol or Tums? Wear a seat belt? Some companies are asking a battery of questions to test employees' requests for religious exemptions to Covid-19 vaccination rules.
cleaned_text: Oct. 31, 2021 10:00 am ET Big U.S. companies are taking a range of approaches to dealing with employee requests for a religious exemption to Covid-19 vaccine mandates, according to internal documents viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
